text: So you did it. Tought Adam. He really did it. He get all what he needed to be adventurer.
He had it all! The weapon, the backpack, the companion. Then what now?
What was the missing piece? Where is the adventure?
The question, which followed Adam in years to come.  Yet there was no answer.
Until one day, Adam decided to ask the diffrent question. Does the need adventurers?
Everybody dreams... or at least used to at some point of their life. Until the dreams became nothing more but memories of childish naivet√©.
Adam lost his dream. What about you? Will you try again?
